Your Club

Discover our history, training locations, Academy, and how to join East Grinstead AC.

Training Locations

Imberhorne Ln
East Grinstead RH19 1QY
Lewes Rd
East Grinstead RH19 3TY

Academy

Our Academy is an introduction to athletics for children in school years 4 and 5. We train and work towards the Sussex Quadkids Competition which takes place at the K2 in Crawley. Quadkids encompasses all key aspects of athletics: endurance, speed, agility and strength. The events are: 75m sprint, howler throw, standing jump and 600m. We accept 40 children and hold a waiting list.

Due to changes in the age groups across England Athletics, we're still awaiting an update on the Quadkids competition in 2026.

Club Fees

Our club fees for the 2025/26 season (April 2025 to March 2026) are as follows:

  • Those joining between January and March, the England Athletics Registration Fees continue until March 31st of the following year (max 15 months).
  • England Athletics does not require registration for Academy athletes.
  • All additional family members will attract a one-third discount on club fees.
  • In order to ensure athletics is available to all, if you are having difficulty affording these fees, please contact the Membership Secretary to discuss options available.
